p: At the very top, on the right hand side, notice a drop-down list with Select a world written. Click on it and select Alone; you will see Reeborg appear in the world, in the bottom left corner.

p.small: You might have to minimize this Contents window, or move it to the right in order to see Reeborg.

p: Click on the "execute" or "run" button above {execute_button} and watch what happens.
